The Nuggets broke open the game with a 39-14 run in the third quarter
Post-Match Reflections: The Nuggets won their third straight game, starting a busy 17-game month on the right note
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets finished a perfect 21 of 21 from the free throw line
They also set a season-high in assists with 44
